DOC.brief_summary: Prospective randomize open multicenter trial blind adjudication endpoint assess efficacy six-month low-dose LMWH prevention symptomatic incidental VTE patient stage IV lung cancer elevate D-dimer .
DOC.brief_title: Prophylaxis Venous Thromboembolism Advanced Lung Cancer ( PROVE )
DOC.detailed_description: Adult patient age ≥ 18 year stage IV lung cancer elevate D-dimer randomized experimental control group.Patients control group receive usual care , patient experimental group receive subcutaneous tinzaparin daily six month . Follow-up visit take place outpatient clinic day 90 , day 180 day 360 . Blood sample biomarkers perform inclusion visit day 90 .
DOC.criteria: Age ≥ 18 year Social security affiliation Written inform consent Histologically confirm stage IV ( M1a M1b ) nonsmallcell lung cancer , include recurrent nonsmallcell lung cancer period complete remission Ddimer > 1,500 µg/L Planned ongoing chemotherapy target anticancer therapy ECOG 02 Life expectancy > 3 month Hypersensitivity heparin History heparininduced thrombocytopenia Ongoing anticoagulant treatment VTE inclusion Creatinin clearance < 30 mL/min Active bleed Platelet count < 100,000 G/L inclusion Severe hepatic insufficiency Cancer treat exclusively supportive care Previous inclusion trial Aspirin daily dosage > 160 mg Pregnancy
